name: Rishabh Jain
experience:
Info Edge India Limited - 99Acres01/2025 – Present
Software Development EngineerNoida, Uttar Pradesh
•
Delivered 10+ AI-powered tools for QA and Product team, reducing manual effort and accelerating release cycles.
•
Led a team to research and evaluate 15+ AI models, integrating selected solutions into QA workflows and boosting test
coverage.
•
Engineered and deployed 20+ microservices using React, Spring Boot, Flask, MongoDB, and REST APIs, enabling
scalable AI integrations across modules.
•
Prototyped a voice-enabled AI feature for users, validated in 50+ pilot test cases, enhancing accessibility and showcasing
product innovation.
Ezinore Pvt. Ltd.09/2023 – 11/2023
Cloud Engineer InternNew Delhi, Delhi
•
Built and optimized cloud infrastructure using AWS, managing services like EC2, DynamoDB, IoT Core, and Lambda to
support growing user demand.
•
Integrated 5 ML APIs to elevate platform insights and responsiveness across user interfaces.
•
Devised a resource plan using AWS Pricing Calculator, reducing cloud expenses by 25% while maintaining system
performance.
PROJECTS
Realtime Chat Application|MERN Stack, Socket.io12/2024
•
Developed a real-time messaging platform with sub-second latency and offline queueing for 50+ concurrent users.
•
Integrated DiceBear API for randomized avatars and anonymous, auto-expiring chatrooms (15 min inactivity).
•
Designed a dark-themed UI having 15+ options that adapts to user tone via basic NLP sentiment analysis.
Predictive Maintenance for Industrial Equipment|Python, scikit-learn, Data Visualization07/2024
•
Trained a classification model on historical sensor data to forecast equipment failures with 92% accuracy.
•
Compared the performance of 5 distinct classification models including Random Forest, XGBoost and SVM, identifying
XGBoost as superior.
•
Applied ensemble strategies with anomaly detection, validated using 10-fold cross-validation.
•
Illustrated trends and predictions through 5+ clear data visualizations using matplotlib and seaborn.
ACHIEVEMENTS
•
Earned over 100

Projects
DSW Website:MERN StackAugust 2023 - October 2023
•

percent
•

Personal Blog:Next.jsMarch 2025
•
Developed an SEO-optimized personal blog website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, with responsive design and
smooth animations.

Focused on modern UI/UX practices and accessibility for a seamless reading experience across all devices.
Medical Social Media Platform:MERN Stack, using cursor aiaugust 2025
•
Developed a professional networking platform for medical students and doctors, similar to LinkedIn, enabling
knowledge sharing and career growth.

engagement.
•
Integrated secure authentication and responsive design, resulting in a 40 percent improvement in user retention.
